sentences.sContent: Students have to pick three courses from a list of 15.
sentences.sCn: 学生必须从15门课中选修3门。

sentences.sContent: I don’t know which colour to pick.
sentences.sCn: 我不知道要选哪个颜色。

sentences.sContent: Who’s going to pick the team for the match on Saturday?
sentences.sCn: 谁将为星期六的比赛挑选队员？

sentences.sContent: Russell spoke slowly, picking his words (= choosing what to say ) very carefully.
sentences.sCn: 罗素讲得很慢，措辞谨慎。

phrases.pCn: [用以加强语气，尤指人群关系]谨慎选择
对某人不满；与某人起争端
[体]掩护转身切入；挡切战术；掩护走位

remMethod.val: 捡起 (pick) 球大脚开 (kick) 出去

words.tran: 采摘；掘，撬开；采得物；赃物
采摘者；采摘机；啄者；挖掘者

trans.tranOther: to choose a person or thing, for example because they are the best or most suitable
if you can have your pick or take your pick of different things, you can choose which one you want
